parents dead massage ?
comment dude (or ugly bastard) this not 2007-2008.

It is kinda hilarious that a lot of the people in this site that believes in those chain comments are the same persons who enjoy ugly bastard loli rape.
Chain comments are not enemy stands for Megumin's sake don't take them seriously.
ehhhhhh another long one with almost nothing interesting in it, 5/10 just cause the art was decent

Day 1- Manga 13*
I can see more blood than sperm in this one, the guy almost died a ton of times, what is he, Jesus? The art was actually pretty good so I'll give it a 5/10.
See y'all next time.

FOR FUCKS SAKE EVERYONE, READING A POINTLESS CHAIN COMMENT DOESN'T KILL YOUR GODDAMN PARENTS, IF YOU COMMENT THAT SHIT I SWEAR TO GOD, I HOPE YOU AND YOUR FUCKING FAMILY WILL BE RAPED TO DEATH IN HELL YOU PIECES OF SHIT ALONG WITH THE PEOPLE WHO MADE THE BOTS TO COMMENT THAT SHIT OVER AND OVER AGAIN

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't underestimate random people curse. This will put you into overthinking shit. MADAFAKA
My fucking god. Just stop spamming this copy pasta bullshit. If you just ignore it nothing is gonna happen.
